de.cardcontact.tlv

Class PrimitiveTLV

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.cardcontact.tlv.TLV
      • de.cardcontact.tlv.PrimitiveTLV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TreeNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObjectIdentifier

    public class PrimitiveTLV
extends TLV
    Base class for all primitive TLV objects
    Author:
    Andreas Schwier (info@cardcontact.de)
